script.name: Menu.PC.ShipCompendium.Single
script.description: Menu: Ships Info - Set Menu, Single Ship

line.comment: * add custom menu heading to array $Menu: title='Found at Shipyards'
* $Shipyards = [PLAYERSHIP]-> get shipyards sells ware: ware= $Ware , jumps= 999 , flags= [Find.Known] , exclude= null
* for each $ShipyardCurrent in array $Shipyards using counter $Count
* $Text = sprintf: fmt='%s', $ShipyardSector, null, null, null, null
* add custom menu item to array $Menu: text=$Text returnvalue=null
* add custom menu item to array $Menu: text='No known shipyards' returnvalue=null
* add non selectable menu item: $Menu, text=$Text

sval.val: Menu: Ships Info - Set Menu, Single Ship
add custom menu heading to array $Menu: title='Found at Shipyards'
$Shipyards = [PLAYERSHIP]-> get shipyards sells ware: ware= $Ware , jumps= 999 , flags= [Find.Known] , exclude= null
for each $ShipyardCurrent in array $Shipyards using counter $Count
$Text = sprintf: fmt='%s', $ShipyardSector, null, null, null, null
add custom menu item to array $Menu: text=$Text returnvalue=null
add custom menu item to array $Menu: text='No known shipyards' returnvalue=null
add non selectable menu item: $Menu, text=$Text
